sourcesContent:
<template>
    <Line :data="chartData" :options="chartOptions" />
</template>

<script>
import {
    Chart as ChartJS,
    CategoryScale,
    LinearScale,
    PointElement,
    LineElement,
    Title,
    Tooltip,
    Legend
} from 'chart.js'
import { Line } from 'vue-chartjs'

ChartJS.register(
    CategoryScale,
    LinearScale,
    PointElement,
    LineElement,
    Title,
    Tooltip,
    Legend
)

export default {
    name: 'BarChart',
    components: { Line },
    props: {
        chartData: {
            type: Object,
            required: true
        }
    },
   data() {
       return {
           chartOptions: {
               //min scale to 1 and step is 1
                scales: {
                     y: {
                          beginAtZero: true,
                          min: 1
                     }
                },
           }
       }
   }
}
</script>
